mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (item_no, username, cart_ea, cart_price, cart_totalprice) VALUES (#{itemNo}, #{username}, #{cartEa}, #{cartPrice}, #{cartTotalPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT c.item_no, c.username, c.cart_ea, c.cart_price, c.cart_totalprice, i.item_irum, img.image_name FROM cart c JOIN item i ON c.item_no = i.item_no JOIN item_image img ON i.item_no = img.item_no WHERE c.username = #{username}
